channel.title: How do you fix up the requirements of something?
channel.description: does any know how to change the requirements of something? for example a attack cape

item.title: How do you fix up the requirements of something?
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

How To Change Requirements-
Go To Client.java and search- CLAttack Click Next 4 Times
You Should See This-

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim();…
Go All The Way To The Bottom And Add This-

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Attack Cape")) { return 99;
Ok, The Attack Cape Is Obviosly The Item and The-

return 99;

99 == The Level Needed For It

If You Wanna Add A Non Combat Skill Tell Me…

Post Comments!
~Scootkid

Read full topic
